ShopFits / Store Fixtures

Bespoke shop fittings and store fixtures, designed and created to serve your needs

How We designyour Store

Fixtures and Shop-in-Shop (SIS)Units

 

Planning for an effective store or shop-in-shop unit consist of a few steps. Our well structured process makes it easy for you to create a display kit that will attract you target audience, and provide a consistent experience across stores.

Design Brief and Understanding

We understand in detail your product offering, objectives and priorities for the store, along with your brand guidelines in the form of store kit elements.

Fixture/shopfit Manufacturing

We manufacture the relevant no of fixtures store-wise and get them approved as per original prototype and our quality team conducts various tests to ensure finish and life of the fixture.

Store Kit Elements Design

These elements are then individually designed in multiple size-variation and cost-variations (if needed). Each element is costed and the entire kit is then frozen. Design cost depends on number and complexity of elements.

PAN-India Installation

Once the civil work is completed at client end, our installation teams travel across the country and ensure the fixtures are implemented perfectly as per site. Any issues are sorted on-site.

Fixture Kit Prototyping

All the relevant elements in the kit are prototyped to finalize the finish, quality, and utility. Any discrepancies or suggestions can be incorporated at this stage to make the element more appealing or effective.

New Store 3D Adaptation

Every time you plan a new store, we pick from the store kit and adapt the fixtures according to the floorplan and provide 3D adaptions of store look.

Our Team of Experts Do Their Best

We understand that a good store should highlight all the merchandise powerfully and the design must be scalable.

We design complete store kits that help you scale.

Research

Keeping its dynamics into consideration, the research design is categorised into two different perspectives

Ui Design

We focuses on anticipating what users might need  and ensuring that the interface has elements that are easy to access

Develop

Do not just settle with the generic information or brief given by the client. Drill down further to understand the product/service and try to achieve clear and conclusive information

Support

We offer the customers — both before and after they buy and use your products or services — that helps them have an easy and enjoyable experience with you.

Interactive 3D View & Design

You’ll know exactly how your store is going to look with our interactive 3D viewer, which will give you a 360 degree preview on our portal.It will not only catch the attention of prospects but keep them interested in the products

discover more

One Design & Many Stores

Planning for an effective store or shop-in-shop unit consist of a few steps. Our well structured process makes it easy for you to create a display kit that will attract you target audience, and provide a consistent experience across stores.

Check out our product

Promotional Display Stands

A free-standing display unit, also known as an FSDU can be essential in taking your product and brand to the next level. Much of the time an FSDU is what draws the customer in and represents your product and brand in the first instance.
Read More ...

Covid Range Display Stands

Covid range of display stands both internal and external such as roll-up banners, bollard covers, sandwich boards and forecourt display stands to name but a few to remind people to practice social distancing.
Read More ...

Foldable Display Stands

Foldable Displays are an excellent marketing strategy for you to reach out to customers about your brand. In a highly competitive industry, marketing has become a key factor in helping certain beer brands to stand out from the rest.
Read More ...

Tailor Made Display Stands

Brands can design unique glorifiers to display their product in a non-traditional way. Serving ornamental purposes with a exceptional visual experience, that is simultaneously attractive and informative to the shopper, glorifiers represent the perfect platform to set a product in scene with almost unlimited possibilities regarding shape, design and material.
Read More ...

Flexible Shelf Display Stands

The stability and flexibility of this modular solution comes from the recyclable plastic shelf clips, which enables shelves to be positioned almost anywhere and filled right to the edges. Clips can be disposed of in the waste paper stream and recycled according to type.
Read More ...
